messages.message:
Hi @Kerry, @Serena, NatWest are asking a confirmation on whether the  Scheduler App UI fixes will be made available in the July release.
Could you please confirm? I can’t see any updates on https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/UI-148 nor https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/PX-1244. Thanks

CC @Aimé
Runtime flow config will not be in the July release, but the fix so that the file picker is not in the background will be in the July release.
ok thanks Jessica for confirming, as long it is possible to  select files in the Scheduler App, then it’s fine (Runtime flow config feature is a nice to have feature and can wait).
